discussion.content:
Found this in this documentation from Salesforce:
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.creating_web_tabs.htm&type=5

Enter the URL or choose the custom s-control that you want to display in the tab. Optionally, copy and paste any merge fields for data that you want dynamically replaced in the link. Click Preview Web Tab to display your web tab.

Selected Answer: B
B. A URL that passes salesforce.com data like an organization's name

Custom Web Tabs in Salesforce can include the following types of content:

A. A URL
C. An S-Control
D. An S-Control snippet

However, the option "A URL that passes salesforce.com data like an organization's name" is not a typical capability of Custom Web Tabs. Custom Web Tabs are generally used for integrating external web content or web applications within Salesforce, and they may not inherently pass Salesforce data like an organization's name through the URL.

So, the correct answer is:
B. A URL that passes salesforce.com data like an organization's name

choices.B: A URL that passes salesforce.com data like an organization's name

questions.question_text: Custom Web Tab may consist of all the following EXCEPT:

choices.A: Private for OWD and CRED for Profiles
choices.D: Public Read/Write for OWD and No Access for Profiles
choices.C: Private for OWD and No Access for Profiles
choices.B: Public Read/Write for OWD and CRED for Profiles

questions.question_text: What are the defaults for Org Wide Default (OWD) and Profile permissions for all Profiles that have View All Data or Modify All Data disabled on a custom object?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
This is the message that you receive once you create a new Custom Object:
Permissions for this object are disabled for all profiles by default. You can enable object permissions in permission sets or by editing custom profiles.

Selected Answer: D
For all newly created objects, profiles will have no access and owd will be public read/write

questions.question_text:
Ursa Major Solar has an existing process for their solar panel Opportunities that include the following stages:
✑ Prospecting
✑ Value Proposition
✑ Negotiation/Review
✑ Closed Won
✑ Closed Lost
They want to implement a new process for their battery Opportunities using the following stages:
✑ Qualification
✑ Value Proposition
✑ Negotiation/Review
✑ Closed Won
✑ Closed Lost
What should the administrator configure to implement these changes?

choices.C: Create a new sales process that includes the relevant stages and assign it to the new battery record type on Opportunity.
choices.D: Edit the stage field on Opportunity and activate qualification as a value.
choices.A: Update the existing Opportunity sales process to include qualification as a valid stage.
choices.B: Create a new battery record type on Opportunity and add the appropriate values to the stage picklist.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
You need a new sales process
C is correct one, you need a different sales process

Selected Answer: A
It's A.

Why is not C - Because they have access to the records already but they don't access to modify.
What is the correct answer for this question? Seems divided.
A. Assign a permission set with the edit permission on Contact to the supervisors that need it.
it should be sharing rules as it lets you access records you don't own. B is the correct option

choices.D: Change the supervisor users' profiles to be sales rep.
choices.C: Update the supervisor profile with edit permission on Contact.
choices.A: Assign a permission set with the edit permission on Contact to the supervisors that need it.
choices.B: Create a sharing rule to grant read/write access on Contact to the supervisor role.

questions.question_text:
Supervisors at Universal Containers have read access to Contacts through their profiles. Sales reps have a separate profile them to edit Contacts. Some sales reps are attending a conference for a week and supervisors will need to fill in to update Contact details while they are out.
How should an administrator grant proper access to the supervisors?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Data Loader - the wizard can import campaign members, not campaigns themselves. Data Loader can import all objects.
Answer is dataloader as Data Import Wizards cannot import campaigns.
Data Import Wizard is not capable to upload Campaigns

questions.question_text:
Ursa Major Solar wants to upload 10,000 Campaigns to Salesforce.
Which tool should the administrator utilize to accomplish this task?
